item.description:
For many, Cabela's is a foreign country full of stuff you may not have a clue how to use. Some of us who hike a ton are going to look at equipment, really. The return goods room is spectacular.

There are those though who have asked to be shown the camo lingerie and pink rifles. It will be a cultural adventure for many. I request that you try not to stare. The snack bar sells buffalo burgers and other fried treats.

We will be there for the Spring Sale days. The trout fishing seminar is the week before and we will miss the knife sharpening class. Darn it.

So come in your pickem' up truck and get ready to observe the bubbas in their natural habitat. Actually we may find some great stuff we need for hiking and camping.

Sense of humor absolutely required.

Cabelas home page:
http://www.cabelas.co...


Directions to the store we are going to:
http://www.cabelas.co...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Scouting out equipment (and the bubbas) at Cabela's, East Hartford CT
